overview:
Identive is focused on building the world’s signature company in Secure ID. We provide a range of offerings along the value chain of identification-based technologies – from core RFID components to fully integrated identity management systems. Our products, software, systems and services address the markets for identity management, physical and logical access control, near field communications (NFC) and a host of RFID-enabled applications. Our customers include national, state and local governments and leading companies in the enterprise, consumer, education, healthcare and transportation sectors. We operate globally with employees on five continents.

To address the market for secure identification-based technologies, Identive provides products and solutions through two operating segments, “Identification Products & Components” and “Identity Management Solutions & Services.”

Identive leverages a technology base that includes more than 120 global patents in 40 patent families. Our core offerings include market-leading smart card readers/terminals, RFID transponders, software, security systems as well as integration and other services that position us to address three unique convergence trends:

the integration of physical and logical access systems; the enhancement of smart cards with contactless technologies; and the marriage of secure identification technologies with mobile communication.

Our growth model is based on a combination of strong technology-driven organic growth and disciplined acquisitive expansion. Our strategy aims to take advantage of the tremendous growth potential of the markets in which we operate and to act as a consolidator in a highly fragmented industry. Identive combines strong operational know-how, deep domain expertise and a global network of contacts to enable this strategy.

The Identive management team is highly experienced in building an effective and viable long term strategy, in acquisition integration and synergy extraction, as well as in developing significant organic growth in the RFID marketplace.

Our on-going mission is to build a lasting business of scale and technology to both enable and capitalize on the growth of the security and RFID industries.
